definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: [[שׂכה]] (√ of foll.; NH [[סָכָה]] look out, Aram. [[סְכָא]] look out, hope, [[סַכְוׇאָה]] watchman, [[סָכוּתָא]] (for Heb. [[מִחְפָּה]]) outlook-point; sco0 Pa. hope for; Ar. 4aka0 (w,y) is complain (i.e. disclose grief ?), mi4ka0h;un lamp-niche, Eth. mascot: window).
